TopicTitle: Full Thrust, 0 change in orbital path or change in speed

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: windows 10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 3800XT 8-Core Processor | GPU: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 | RAM: 32

 

When doing an interstellar mission to duna when all of a sudden i had to engaged Full thrust to change the orbital path, so I wouldn't crash in the surface of Duna how ever nothing changed in my orbital inclination nor my speed how ever the only thing that did change was the fuel amount. 

intercept this is unacceptable, you have everything you need to make this game complete for release but noooooooo
